commands.name: screenshot
commands.title: Take Screenshot
commands.description: 快速截取屏幕并悬浮显示

scripts.prebuild: test -f float-window || (test -f build-native.sh && ./build-native.sh || echo '请运行 ./build-native.sh 编译 float-window')
scripts.postbuild: if [ -f float-window ] && [ -d ~/.config/raycast/extensions/screenshots-plugin ]; then cp float-window ~/.config/raycast/extensions/screenshots-plugin/; fi
